author: K. Stubbs
content: The seaport facilities at Quonset Point, Rhode Island are referred to as the Port of Davisville.

author: Nobody
content: Thank the post office for erasing more communities. Davisville zip code includes Quonset Pt.

author: Doug Faunt

Davisville isn’t a port.
